title: Hong Kong’s Fosun tokenizes shares of medical company valued at $328 million
summary: Vaulta's Banking OS now integrates Solana for issuance and settlement. This move enhances the company's initiative, combining cutting-edge technology with effic

body.raw:
![Hong Kong’s Fosun tokenizes shares of medical company valued at $328 million](https://www.tbstat.com/wp/uploads/2025/04/20250411_Tokens_News_2-800x450.jpg)

Vaulta's Banking OS now integrates Solana for issuance and settlement. This move enhances the company's initiative, combining cutting-edge technology with efficient processes in the crypto space. Exciting developments for crypto enthusiasts to watch!

---

**Original Article:** [The Block](https://www.theblock.co/post/368395/hong-kongs-fosun-tokenizes-328-million-rwa?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss)
